help.dragAndDrop: Click and drag source (red) or observer (green) to move them
help.objectSelection: S: Select source | O: Select observer | Arrow keys: Move selected object
help.controls: Space: Pause/Resume | R: Reset | H: Toggle help
help.adjust: +/-: Adjust emitted frequency | ,/.: Adjust sound speed
help.scenarios: 0-6: Load preset scenarios (0: Free Play, 1-6: Different scenarios)
help.toggleMotionTrails: Press 'T' to toggle motion trails that show object paths.
help.toggleMicrophone: Press 'M' to toggle the microphone that clicks when waves pass through it.
help.dragMicrophone: Drag the microphone to position it anywhere in the simulation.
